Onze producten komen in hersluitbare gla: Our products come in reclosable 500ml glass bottles and contain an alcohol percentage of 17%.
yesyesyes tien windjes in een fles: The bottles can be collected free of charge at one of our team members or delivered to your home in Belgium (+ shipping costs).
Maak kennis met Madam Cherry: zij brengt: A combination of freshly pressed apple and cherry juice. One of the most popular flavours in our product range.
Lady Barbara brengt een unieke smaak doo: A drink based on pure apple juice and freshly squeezed rhubarb. An unusual but tasty combination for real foodies.
Deze knappe dame is Miss Ginger. Zij ove: A surprising mix of apple, ginger and a hint of lemon. An explosion of flavours for the courageous.
Duchess Fran, deze chique dame neemt jou: A bright red colour, apple juice and raspberry juice. That is all that is needed to describe this delicious drink.
Met deze box, kan je heerlijke cocktails: With this box, you can make delicious cocktails with our drinks. This box contains:
Fles (500ml) naar keuze - gelieve dit do: Bottle (500ml) of your choice - please specify when ordering
